skills.summary: Transform AI agents from task-followers into proactive partners that anticipate needs and continuously improve. Battle-tested patterns for agents that learn from every interaction and create value without being asked.

latestVersion.changelog:
Proactive Agent v1.2.3 is a major upgrade, focusing on proactive behavior, robust memory, and heightened reliability.

- New memory architecture: context is now saved before compaction to ensure continuity.
- Adds reverse prompting: agent now surfaces ideas and suggestions the user may not have thought to ask for.
- Robust onboarding: new multi-mode onboarding system for frictionless setup and learning from conversation.
- Enhanced self-healing: the agent can diagnose and fix its own issues.
- Strengthened security: improved defenses against prompt injection and malicious inputs.
- Advanced alignment: refined systems to keep the agent focused on the user and mission over time.

latestVersion.changelog:
# Changelog - n8n Enhanced Workflow Management Skill

## Version 2.0.0 - 10 Feb  2026

### üéâ Major Enhancement Release

Complete redesign of the n8n skill with comprehensive workflow lifecycle management capabilities.

### ‚ú® New Features

#### Testing & Validation
- **Structure Validation:** `n8n_tester.py` validates workflow integrity
  - Node and connection validation
  - Credential checking
  - Configuration verification
  - Flow analysis
- **Dry-Run Testing:** Test workflows with sample data before activation
- **Test Suites:** Run multiple test cases against workflows
- **Validation Reports:** Human-readable test reports with errors and warnings

#### Execution Monitoring
- **Enhanced Execution Tracking:** Real-time execution monitoring
- **Detailed Statistics:** Success/failure rates, execution patterns
- **Error Analysis:** Identify and categorize failure patterns
- **Retry Logic:** Built-in retry support for failed executions

#### Performance Optimization
- **Performance Analysis:** `n8n_optimizer.py` provides comprehensive metrics
  - Execution metrics (success rate, failure patterns)
  - Node analysis (complexity, expensive operations)
  - Connection analysis (parallel paths, bottlenecks)
  - Performance scoring (0-100)
- **Bottleneck Detection:** Identify workflow performance issues
  - Sequential expensive operations
  - High failure rates
  - Missing error handling
- **Optimization Suggestions:** Actionable recommendations
  - Parallel execution opportunities
  - Caching strategies
  - Batch processing
  - Error handling improvements
  - Complexity reduction
- **Optimization Reports:** Human-readable performance reports

### üìù API Extensions

#### n8n_api.py Enhancements
- `validate_workflow()` - Validate workflow structure
- `dry_run_workflow()` - Test workflow with mock data
- `get_workflow_statistics()` - Get execution statistics
- `analyze_workflow_performance()` - Performance analysis
- CLI support for `create`, `validate`, and `stats` commands

#### New Modules
- **n8n_tester.py** - Testing and validation
  - Structure validation
  - Dry-run execution
  - Test suite runner
  - Report generation
- **n8n_optimizer.py** - Performance optimization
  - Performance analysis
  - Bottleneck detection
  - Optimization suggestions
  - Report generation

### üìö Documentation

#### New Documentation
- **README.md** - Quick start guide with examples
- **SKILL.md** - Comprehensive documentation (16KB)
  - All CLI commands
  - Python API examples
  - Common workflows
  - Best practices
  - Troubleshooting guide
- **templates/README.md** - Template documentation
  - Template descriptions
  - Configuration guides
  - Test data examples
- **CHANGELOG.md** - This file

#### Updated Documentation
- Enhanced quick reference
- Added validation examples
- Performance optimization guides
- Template usage examples

### üóÇÔ∏è File Structure

```
~/clawd/skills/n8n/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                   # Quick start guide
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ SKILL.md                    # Comprehensive documentation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CHANGELOG.md                # This file
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ scripts/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ n8n_api.py             # Core API client (extended)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ n8n_tester.py          # NEW: Testing & validation
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ n8n_optimizer.py       # NEW: Performance optimization
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ references/
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ api.md
```

### üîß Technical Improvements

- **Modular Design:** Separated concerns into specialized modules
- **Error Handling:** Comprehensive error checking and reporting
- **Import Flexibility:** Support for both direct and module imports
- **Validation Logic:** Standalone validation without API dependency
- **Performance Metrics:** Multi-dimensional workflow analysis
- **Extensible Templates:** Easy to add new workflow templates

### üìä Metrics & Analysis

New performance metrics tracked:
- Execution success/failure rates
- Node complexity scores (0-100)
- Performance scores (0-100)
- Health status (excellent/good/fair/poor)
- Bottleneck severity levels

### üéØ Use Cases

The enhanced skill now supports:

3. **Performance Tuning:** Identify and resolve bottlenecks

No breaking changes. All v1.0 functionality preserved and enhanced:

- `list-executions` / `get-execution` - Still works

- `validate` - Validate workflow structure
- `stats` - Get execution statistics

- Added standalone validation for file-based workflows
- Improved error messages for missing credentials

### ‚ö° Performance

- Efficient execution monitoring with configurable polling

### üîê Security

- No credentials stored in templates (placeholders only)
- Environment variable-based authentication
- Validation runs safely without modifying workflows

### üì¶ Dependencies

No new dependencies
- `requests` (existing)

All notable changes to the AgentsBank SDK are documented in this file.

### Added
- Comprehensive error types and handling in new `src/errors.ts`
- Enhanced type definitions for better IDE support and type safety

### Changed
- Enhanced client implementation with better request handling

- `estimateGas` parameter validation (address format, amount value, chain type)

- Validation happens earlier (client-side) to catch errors before API calls
- More robust key handling across Ethereum, BSC, Solana, and Bitcoin chains

## [1.0.3] - 2026-02-06

- Fixed missing `wallet_id` in wallet response objects

Major vs Minor Task Classification ‚Äì All tasks are now explicitly labeled; Major tasks cannot be delegated, Minor tasks may be delegated under strict reporting rules.

Delegation Boundary Enforcement ‚Äì Added a layer that forbids opaque or unobservable delegation; loss of visibility triggers immediate halt.

Planner Output Contract Expansion ‚Äì Planner must declare task classification and delegation intent; mislabeling or undeclared delegation halts execution.

Execution Semantics Update ‚Äì Major tasks run synchronously in primary control flow; Minor tasks block until completion; background or hidden execution disallowed.

Risk Gate & Ambiguity Strengthening ‚Äì Opacity, misclassification, and delegation ambiguity are treated as first-class halt conditions to enforce observability and prevent autonomy abuse.

skills.summary: Auto-route tasks to the cheapest Claude model that works correctly. Three-tier progression: Haiku ‚Üí Sonnet ‚Üí Opus. Classify before responding. HAIKU (default): factual Q&A, greetings, reminders, status checks, lookups, simple file ops, heartbeats, casual chat, 1-2 sentence tasks. ESCALATE TO SONNET: code >10 lines, analysis, comparisons, planning, reports, multi-step reasoning, tables, long writing >3 paragraphs, summarization, research synthesis, most user conversations. ESCALATE TO OPUS: architecture decisions, complex debugging, multi-file refactoring, strategic planning, nuanced judgment, deep research, critical production decisions. Rule: If a human needs >30 seconds of focused thinking, escalate. If Sonnet struggles with complexity, go to Opus. Save 50-90% on API costs by starting cheap and escalating only when needed.
